title: For far too long (Katarina)
body:
Greetings and Salutations fellow Summoners
For far too long have we seen games gone by snowballing Katarina's
For far too long have we suffered and endless pentas from Katarina's
For far too long has there not being any nerfs which have helped
For far too long we have been quite
Now we must rally up and Change her
Now the serious stuff
We all love her abilities am i not right?
We all think there good for her
But we all hate her Passive 
Yes lets just reset every assist/kill
I have an idea 
Lets change her passive only
I believe that a good passive for Katarina would be 
a passive where every 10 seconds her next ability does 10%/20%/30% more damage
increasing every ult upgrade
now to make her a bit more powerful i would suggest that we decrease the passive buff every ult upgrade like so 10/7.5/5 seconds

Now i must say thank you for reading any comments would be appreciated and 
Adios Summoners

well sed any cc destroys her she is all in or get shit she has no escape shut her down early and come team fight she will be like a 2 year old hitting a 20 year old ow kat stop it ow that hert
I haven't seen a kat in ages, nowadays everyone just plays mainstream noob champions like Viktor and Yasuo.

Really she should lose most of her mid lane match ups due to the fact that she has to fight at close range , has poor farm ability and no cc of her own , and as long as other lanes ward , and mid follows her when she trys to roam and gank she really shouldnt ever be much of a threat since she is so easily shut down. She needs kills to get resets , and since her ult is a channel almost every other champ has something to end it.  Once her ult is down , she is easy to take out.
Exhaust her when she ults. stun, silence , knockback , knockup , fear... zhonyas , blink/flash away.  She may be reasonably difficult to shut down if she gets fed , same as many other hyper-carries , but she has so many weaknesses early-mid game that she only really gets fed if you let her.
I have only seen Kat in bot game when I played recently.
